get.description: The API takes the waybill/AWB as input and returns the proof of delivery in PDF format as an URL

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Enter the API key given to you by the Clickpost team

parameters.name: waybill
parameters.description: The AWB number of the shipment for which the POD needs to be fetched

parameters.name: cp_id
parameters.description: Courier Partner ID of the courier from which shipment was dispatched.

message.example: You are not registered to use this service, Please Register : Account of this shipment is not registered for POD
Ops! Internal server error in Clickpost

get.description: Enterprise can get the latest tracking updates from Clickpost in two ways: Polling or Webhooks. This API uses polling to track an order, given it's waybill number and courier partner ID. Polling API retrieves the historic statuses and the current status of the package.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username of the customer using the Clickpost API for tracking

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Unique license key of the customer to be used for authentication

parameters.name: cp_id
parameters.description: Partner ID of the courier responsible for delivering the shipment
